name: bundle
description: Ruby依赖管理工具，为Ruby项目提供一致的运行环境

options.description: Specify the number of times you wish to attempt network commands
Install the gems specified by the `Gemfile` or `Gemfile.lock`
Update dependencies to their latest versions
Package the .gem files required by your application into the `vendor/cache` directory (aliases: `bundle package`, `bundle pack`)
Execute a script in the current bundle
Specify and read configuration options for Bundler
Display detailed help for each subcommand
Add the named gem to the Gemfile and run `bundle install`
Generate binstubs for executables in a gem
Determine whether the requirements for your application are installed and available to Bundler
Show the source location of a particular gem in the bundle
Show all of the outdated gems in the current bundle
Start an IRB session in the current bundle (deprecated)
Open an installed gem in the editor
Generate a lockfile for your dependencies
Generate a visual representation of your dependencies (deprecated)
Generate a simple `Gemfile`, placed in the current directory
Create a simple gem, suitable for development with Bundler
Clean up unused gems in your Bundler directory
Obsolete command, should no longer be used

name: bundler
description: Ruby依赖管理工具，为Ruby项目提供一致的运行环境

options.description: Specify the number of times you wish to attempt network commands
Install the gems specified by the `Gemfile` or `Gemfile.lock`
Update dependencies to their latest versions
Package the .gem files required by your application into the `vendor/cache` directory (aliases: `bundle package`, `bundle pack`)
Execute a script in the current bundle
Specify and read configuration options for Bundler
Display detailed help for each subcommand
Add the named gem to the Gemfile and run `bundle install`
Generate binstubs for executables in a gem
Determine whether the requirements for your application are installed and available to Bundler
Show the source location of a particular gem in the bundle
Show all of the outdated gems in the current bundle
Start an IRB session in the current bundle (deprecated)
Open an installed gem in the editor
Generate a lockfile for your dependencies

Generate a simple `Gemfile`, placed in the current directory

Clean up unused gems in your Bundler directory

name: erb
description: Ruby 嵌入式模板引擎，用于处理包含 Ruby 代码的模板文件，生成动态内容

options.description: print ruby script with line number
disable ruby code evaluation for lines beginning with %

name: gem
description: RubyGems 是 Ruby 语言的包管理器，用于安装、管理和发布 Ruby 软件包（gem）

options.description: run as if gem was started in <PATH> instead of the current working directory

name: irb
description: Ruby的交互式解释器，用于交互式执行Ruby代码

options.description: Set external and internal encodings to UTF-8.
Set default external (ex) and internal (in) encodings (same as 'ruby -E').
Set n[0-4] to method to create Binding Object, when new workspace was created.
Add an extra doc dir for the doc dialog.
Don't use single line editor module (default).
Set prompt mode. Pre-defined prompt modes are: 'default', 'classic', 'simple', 'inf-ruby', 'xmp', 'null'.
Use prompt appropriate for inf-ruby-mode on emacs. Suppresses --multiline and --singleline.
Script mode (default, treat first argument as script).
No script mode (leave arguments in argv).
Show stack trace for each command.
Display backtrace top n and bottom n.
Separate options of irb from the list of command-line args.

name: racc
description: Ruby 用 LALR 语法分析器生成器

options.description: Converts line numbers of user codes.
Outputs internal status time to time.
Outputs internal status time to time.
Flags for Racc debugging (do not use).

name: rake
description: Ruby 构建自动化工具（类似 make，基于 Rakefile 定义任务和依赖）

options.description: Enable full backtrace. OUT can be stderr (default) or stdout.
Display job statistics. LEVEL=history displays a complete job list
Suppress backtrace lines matching regexp PATTERN. Ignored if --trace is on.
Show all tasks, even uncommented ones (in combination with -T or -D)
Build all prerequisites, including those which are up-to-date.
Change to DIRECTORY before doing anything.
Describe the tasks (matching optional PATTERN), then exit.
Execute some Ruby code and exit.
Execute some Ruby code, then continue with normal task processing.
Same as -E: execute Ruby code and continue
Use FILENAME as the rakefile to search for.
Use standard project Rakefile search paths, ignore system wide rakefiles.
Include LIBDIR in the search path for required modules.
Same as -I: add lib directory to search path
Specifies the maximum number of tasks to execute in parallel. (default is number of CPU cores + 4)
Do a dry run without executing actions.
Do not search parent directories for the Rakefile.
Same as -N: no Rakefile search in parent dirs
Same as -N: no Rakefile search in parent dirs
Display the tasks and dependencies, then exit.
Same as -P: show tasks and dependencies
Execute some Ruby code, print the result, then exit.
Same as -p: execute Ruby code and print result
Do not log messages to standard output.
Auto-import any .rake files in RAKELIBDIR. (default is 'rakelib')
Same as -R: use default rakelib directory
Like --quiet, but also suppresses the 'in directory' announcement.
Turn on invoke/execute tracing, enable full backtrace. OUT can be stderr (default) or stdout.
Display the tasks (matching optional PATTERN) with descriptions, then exit. -AT combination displays all the tasks, including those without descriptions.
Describe the tasks (matching optional PATTERN), then exit.

name: rbs
description: Ruby 类型签名工具（用于定义和验证 Ruby 代码的类型信息）

options.description: Load RBS files of the library
Load RBS files from the directory
File path of collection configuration (default: rbs_collection.yaml)
Specify the file to output log (defaults to stderr)

name: rdbg
description: Ruby 调试器（支持本地调试控制台、远程调试和进程附加，兼容多种前端工具）

options.description: Do not stop at the beginning of the script.
Same as -n: do not stop at script start
Execute debug command at the beginning of the script.
Execute debug command in the FILE.
Same as -x: execute debug commands from file
Enable command mode. The first argument should be a command name in $PATH.

Start remote debugging with opening the network port. If TCP/IP options are not given, a UNIX domain socket will be used. If FRONTEND is given, prepare for the FRONTEND (supports rdbg, vscode and chrome).
Number of ports to try to connect to
Same as -A: attach to debuggee process
Stop immediately when the debugging feature is loaded.

name: rdoc
description: Ruby 文档生成工具（解析 Ruby/C/Markdown 等文件，生成 HTML/ri 格式文档，支持跨文件交叉引用）

options.description: Specifies the output encoding (preferred over --charset). All files read will be converted to this encoding. Default: UTF-8.
Deprecated. Specifies the output HTML character-set. Use --encoding instead.
Specifies the directory where locale data live.
Same as -a: set visibility to private
Do not process files or directories matching PATTERN.
Same as -x: exclude files/directories by pattern
Use default PATTERN to exclude (default behavior)
Do not use default exclude PATTERN
Don't skip generating documentation for test and spec files
Treat files ending with .new as if they ended with .old (e.g., -E cgi=rb parses xxx.cgi as Ruby)
Same as -E: map file extensions for parsing
Forces rdoc to scan all sources even if no files are newer than the flag file
Do not force scan all sources (default behavior)
Convert RDoc on stdin to HTML
Same as -p: process stdin to HTML
Set the width of tab characters.
Minimum visibility to document a method. One of public, protected (default), private, nodoc (show everything)
Embed mixin methods, attributes, and constants into class documentation (default false)
Do not embed mixin content (default behavior)
The markup format for the named files. Valid values: markdown, rd, rdoc (default), tomdoc
Root of the source tree for documentation. Default: current directory
Directory for guides/FAQ (non-class associated pages). Do not use duplicate filenames with project root
Forces rdoc to write output files even if output directory exists and not created by rdoc
Set the output formatter. One of: darkfish (HTML), pot (.pot file), ri (ri data files)
Add to directories searched for :include: requests (can be used multiple times)
Prints a report on undocumented items. Does not generate files.
Same as -C: show undocumented items report
Do not show undocumented items report
Deprecated --diagram option. Prevents firing debug mode with legacy invocation.
Deprecated. Specifies the output HTML character-set. Use --encoding instead.
Words to be ignored in autolink cross-references
Generate hyperlinks for all known method words (legacy behavior, no #/:: required)
Same as -A: hyperlink all known method words
NAME will be the initial page displayed.
Same as -m: set main initial page
Include line numbers in source code (default: only first line number in comment)
Do not include line numbers in source code
Retain '#' in method links (e.g., #name instead of name)
Same as -H: show hash in method links
Set the template used for HTML output (default depends on formatter)
Set TITLE as the title for HTML output.
Copy static files/directories to output dir (can be used multiple times)
Specify URL for web CVS frontend (replace %s with filename or append filename)
Same as -W: set web CVS URL
Generate ri data files (stored in ~/.rdoc unless --op is set)
Same as -r: generate user-specific ri data
Generate site-wide ri data files (requires special privileges)
Same as -R: generate site-wide ri data
Write .rdoc_options to current directory with given options
Do not show debug output (default behavior)
Warn if rdoc-ref links can't be resolved
Ignore invalid options and continue (default true)
Deprecated: source code is now always inlined
Deprecated: ri now always merges class information
Deprecated: files always only document their content
Deprecated: Ruby installers use other techniques

name: ri
description: Ruby 文档查询工具（用于查看 Ruby 核心库、 gems 及自定义代码的 ri 格式文档）

options.description: In interactive mode you can repeatedly look up methods with autocomplete.
Same as -i: enable interactive mode with autocomplete
Show all documentation for a class or module.
Same as -a: show full documentation for class/module
Send output to a pager (default for paged output)
Set the width of the output.
Run RDoc server on the given port (default: 8214)
Use the selected formatter. Valid options: ansi, bs (default for paged), markdown, rdoc
Expand rdoc-refs at the end of output (default behavior)
List directories from which ri sources documentation and exit
Do not list doc directories (default behavior)
Add directory to source documentation (may be repeated)
Do not include standard docs (Ruby stdlib, site_lib, gems, ~/.rdoc). Use with --doc-dir.
Include documentation from Ruby's standard library (default: true)
Do not run with profiler (default behavior)
Dump data from an ri cache or data file

name: ruby
description: Ruby编程语言的解释器，用于执行Ruby代码

options.description: Set input record separator ($/): -0 for \0; -00 for paragraph mode; -0777 for slurp mode.
Split each input line ($_$) into fields ($F).
Execute given Ruby code; multiple -e allowed.
Set default external and internal encodings.
Set input field separator ($;); used with -a.
Set ARGF in-place mode; create backup files with given extension.
Add specified directory to load paths ($LOAD_PATH); multiple -I allowed.
Set output record separator ($\) to $/; used for line-oriented output.
Define global variables using switches following program path.
Search directories found in the PATH environment variable.
Set warning flag ($-W): 0 for silent; 1 for moderate; 2 for verbose.
Execute Ruby code starting from a #!ruby line.
Enable JIT for the platform; same as --rjit (experimental).
Set template for crash report file.
Print long help message; use -h for short message.
Set Ruby parser: parse.y or prism.
Set $VERBOSE to true; ignore input from $stdin.
Print parser log; backward compatibility not guaranteed.
Size of executable memory block in MiB (default: 64).
Number of calls to trigger JIT (default: 10).
Disable RJIT for lazily enabling it with RubyVM::RJIT.enable.

name: syntax_suggest
description: 解析Ruby源文件并搜索语法错误（如意外的`end`、缺少结束符等）的工具

options.description: Records the steps used to search for a syntax error to the given directory

name: typeprof
description: Ruby类型分析工具，用于分析Ruby代码的类型信息并生成类型注解

options.description: Output to OUTFILE instead of stdout
Display TypeProf version in a header
Do not display TypeProf version in a header
Display possible errors found during the analysis
Do not display possible errors found during the analysis
Do not display parameter names for methods
Display definition source locations for methods
Do not display definition source locations for methods
Specify a port number to listen for requests on
